p: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
q: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
w: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies.
e: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
r: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
